person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The nominees , according to diplomats , are : Kofi Annan of Ghana , the U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping ; Ahmedou Ould Abdallah of Mauritania , the former U.N. special envoy for Burundi ; Amara Essy of the Ivory Coast , its foreign minister and the U.N. General Assembly president in 1994-95 ; and Hamid Algabid of Niger , the secretary-general of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Kofi Annan |
| Ahmedou Ould Abdallah |
| Amara Essy |
| Hamid Algabid |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for my previous mistake. Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to a "Person":

| --- |
| Kofi Annan |
| Ahmedou Ould Abdallah |
| Amara Essy |
| Hamid Algabid |
